item.title: Blog Setup
item.description: blog author.yaml Hugo installation I downloaded a hugo theme https://themes.gohugo.io deploy

item.title: Markdown test
item.description: test Markdown Syntax Rendering Headings The following HTML <h1>‚Äî<h6> elements represent six levels of section headings. <h1> is the highest section level while <h6> is the lowest. H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 Paragraph Xerum, quo qui aut unt expliquam qui dolut labo. Aque venitatiusda cum, voluptionse latur sitiae dolessi aut parist aut dollo enim qui voluptate ma dolestendit peritin re plis aut quas inctum laceat est volestemque commosa as cus endigna tectur, offic to cor sequas etum rerum idem sintibus eiur?

item.title: Rich content
item.description: title: “Rich Content” date: 2020-06-08T08:06:25+06:00 description: Sample post with multiple images, embedded video ect. menu: sidebar: name: Rich Content identifier: rich-content parent: sub weight: 10 hero: images/forest.jpg tags: [“Markdown”,“Content Organization”,“Multi-lingual”] categories: [“Basic”] This sample post tests the followings: Category, sub-category nesting in the sidebar. Hero image and other images are in images folder inside this post directory. Different media rendering like image, tweet, YouTube video, Vimeo video etc. Image Sample Tweet Sample Owl bet you'll lose this staring contest ü¶â pic.

item.title: Resultados de B√∫squeda
item.description: Este archivo existe √∫nicamente para responder a la URL /search con la plantilla de dise√±o search relacionada. No se muestra ning√∫n contenido aqu√≠, todo el contenido se basa en la plantilla layouts/page/search.html Establecer una prioridad muy baja en el mapa del sitio le dir√° a los motores de b√∫squeda que √©ste no es un contenido importante. Esta implementaci√≥n utiliza Fusejs, jquery y mark.js Configuraci√≥n inicial La b√∫squeda depende del tipo de contenido de salida adicional de JSON en config.

item.title: Search Results
item.description: This file exists solely to respond to /search URL with the related search layout template. No content shown here is rendered, all content is based in the template layouts/page/search.html Setting a very low sitemap priority will tell search engines this is not important content. This implementation uses Fusejs and mark.js Initial setup Search depends on additional output content type of JSON in config.toml ``` [outputs] home = [“HTML”, “JSON”] ```
